snippet.title: Knights of the Round Peg
snippet.description: Step into the enchanting world of Knights of the Round Peg, where players embark on a musical journey alongside a brave knight through 75 captivating levels. Equipped with a lute and a quiver of musical notes, the knight bravely embarks on a journey, encountering peg-filled challenges along the way. Players must strategically clear pegs at each level using a limited number of balls. As players progress, they will have the opportunity to explore the beautifully hand-drawn map of the kingdom. Each level backdrop is filled with interactive elements to discover.
